name: Percussive VR (itch)
description:
Percussive VR is a collection of virtual instruments you can play in your home! Learn, practice, perform, or just play — your own creativity is the limit.

Instruments
  • Marimba
  • Vibraphone
  • Xylophone
  • Steelpan / Steel Drum
  • Glockenspiel
  • More to come!
Features
  • Sheet Music import
  • Customizable metronome
  • Optional note names/labels
  • Different mallets (for different types of sound)
  • Adjustable instrument heights
